variants.message: You stumble across a dark room. It has some iron protruding from the side, and two doorways. One has stairs.

options.title: Mine the iron and move on

variants.message: You enter a badly light room; there is some light from the broken ceiling which reveals some sunlight. There is a pile of coal and a seemingly empty doorway.

options.title: Grab the coal and move on

variants.message: You walk into a huge hall. You wonder how it got this far underground. You see some logs in the corner. Probably for making a fire. There's also two doors on each side of the hall.

options.title: Enter the doorway on the right
Grab the logs in the corner and leave the hall
Exit through the doorway on the left
